doc.field: Chicago Mercantile Exchange floor traders and commission house representatives are guesstimating today's hog slaughter at about 275,000 to 285,000 head versus 157,000 week ago and 305,000 a year ago. Cattle slaughter is guesstimated at about 120,000 to 126,000 head versus 109,000 week ago and 133,000 a year ago. Reuter
